729328f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Dock Road
729328f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, west side, about 300 yards south
of Dock Road, showing the B. N.. Du Pay farm (Beers's 1874 map).
March 25, 1927
P. L. Sperr
729328f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Dock Road, Staten Island, NY

729206f-a.title: Richmond: Dock Road - Richmond Hill Road
729206f-a.text:
New Springville Park (Staten Island): Viewing north across
the salt meadows watered by Springville Creek, and showing one
of Staten Islend's water pumping plants near Travis Avenue. The
vantage point is near Dock Road, at Richmond Hill Road.
May 6, 19P9
P. L. Sperr
729206f-a.folder: Dock Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY

729337f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Richmond Hill Road
729337f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, east side, about 300 yards north
of Richmond HEill Road. This house was owned by M. Simonson
in 1874; by Neuben Miller from 1898 to 1907, and by William
Eith in 1917.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729337f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY

729338f-b.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Richmond Hill Road
729338f-b.text:
Richmond Avenue, east side, about 250 feet north
of Richmond Hill Road. The house and farmland were
owned by O. N. Melvin from 1898 to 1907; later by W.
Haughwout. The view is from Richmond Hill Road.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the house as seen from Richmond
Avenue. It is at this date.(1937) the Staten Island
Plant Nursery.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr
729338f-b.folder: Richmond Avenue & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY

729339f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Richmond Hill Road
729339f-a.text:
Richaadhd Avenue, north from Richaond Rill Road.
May 10, 1937
P. L. Sperr

729390f-a.text:
Richmond Road, above Egbertville.
May 1, 1932
